block.name: Float To Short
block.doc: Converts a floating point (real) value to a 16-bit short integer.

param.name: Vec Length
param.doc: Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.

param.name: Scale
param.doc: Sets the scale factor for the conversion. For example: to normalize a sine wave with amplitude of 1.0 to the full range of short integer, use a scale factor of 32768. Values outside the range [-32768, 32767] will saturate rather than wrap around.
